page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Out of the people who are capable of work{28%}are either skilled or semi-skilled,{1%}are in the armed forces or the police force,{11%}are either professionals,managers or employers.The rest are either unskilled or non-manual workers ,this accounts for{9%.80%}of those in work are employed in Hartlepool with the remainder working mainly in Cleveland.
{Method of Travelling to Work
{50%}of people travelling to work go by car,this is the main form of transport in this area.Very few people go by train,this suggests that not many people work a long way from Hartlepool.The rest of the people either walk,go by bus or ride to work.
